image.description: A businessman in a suit doing a kickflip on a skateboard
A graph showing increased productivity with a skateboard icon at the peak
A boardroom with skateboards instead of chairs
A stock market ticker tape with skateboarding terms like 'Ollie,' 'Grind,' and 'Halfpipe' instead of company names
A pie chart made of skateboard wheels with the text 'Risk vs. Reward'
An astronaut skateboarding on the moon
A corporate ladder replaced with a skateboard ramp
A group of penguins in business suits standing around a melting ice cap
A skateboard with company logos on the deck
A random image of a traffic jam with the text 'In Conclusion' overlaid
